subject: Order updates #SSN3300
description_text:
#SSN3300 - order
Sorry guys, Ive mistakenly put wrong shipping info (autofilling)
Could you please put this:

Contact information

ministryofmagic36@gmail.com
Shipping address

Mykola Shershen

Simi Kulzhenkiv St 33, apt 47, Kyiv, 04202, Ukraine

Kyiv

04202

Ukraine

conversations.body_text: Hi Mykola Shershen,    Okay, we've updated your address for you. However, we haven't found a suitable shipping channel to deliver your order at this time.
Does it mean that shipping might take longer then usual?

Hi Mykola Shershen,     We regret to inform you that we are unable to ship your order, as the shipping cost would amount to a staggering $150. If you are willing to cover the $75 fee, we can ship your order at cost price.

okay then lets update shipping info:      FULL NAME  Mykola Shershen       ADDRESS  Max-Planck-Straße, 16a Nova post NP000908643       CITY  Büttelborn       ZONE  Groß-Gerau District       STATE  Hessen       POST CODE  64572       COUNTRY  Deutschland       PHONE NR.  +4915158482750       WORKING HOURS  Mon - Fri 10:00 – 19:00 Sun 09:00-17:00
Hi Mykola Shershen,    Alright, thank you for your message. We'll ship your order as soon as possible!
